technologies.title: Cutting-Edge AI Technologies
technologies.subtitle: We leverage the most advanced AI technologies and platforms to build solutions that define the future of business automation.
technologies.cta_text: Ready to harness the power of these cutting-edge technologies?

dataShowcase.title: Bring Your Messy Data - We'll Handle Everything
dataShowcase.subtitle: No ERP required. No data restructuring needed. Our AI understands whatever you have and builds its own smart database

dataTypes.name: Your Office Files (The Messy Ones)
dataTypes.description: Stop worrying about your scattered Word docs, old Excel files, and random PDFs. Our AI reads everything.
dataTypes.useCase: Turn your document chaos into organized, searchable intelligence
dataTypes.accuracy: AI understands context, not just text

dataTypes.name: Your Google Drive Disaster
dataTypes.description: All those Google Sheets, Docs, and Slides sitting in random folders? AI organizes it all automatically.
dataTypes.useCase: Transform your Google Drive mess into structured business intelligence

dataTypes.name: Your Email Mountains
dataTypes.description: Years of emails with attachments, contracts, and conversations? AI extracts every important detail.
dataTypes.useCase: Turn email chaos into relationship and contract intelligence

dataTypes.name: Your Old System Exports
dataTypes.description: That ancient CRM export, old accounting software data, or CSV files from 2015? AI makes sense of it all.
dataTypes.useCase: Rescue valuable insights from old systems without expensive migrations

dataTypes.name: Your Real-World Mix
dataTypes.description: Photos of whiteboards, scanned documents, voice recordings, and handwritten notes? AI handles the real world.
dataTypes.useCase: Digitize and organize everything from the physical world

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real results from businesses that trusted NordAI to accelerate their digital transformation.
testimonials.ctaText: Ready to join our success stories?

clients.name: Sarah Chen
clients.title: CEO, TechFlow Solutions
clients.content: NordAI transformed our customer service with their custom AI agents. We've reduced response time by 70% while maintaining exceptional quality.

clients.name: Michael Rodriguez
clients.title: VP Operations, LogiCorp
clients.content: The AI automation system NordAI built for us eliminated manual data entry entirely. Our team now focuses on strategic work instead of repetitive tasks.

clients.name: Emily Thompson
clients.title: Marketing Director, GrowthLab
clients.content: Their predictive analytics solution helped us identify our best leads 3x faster. Our conversion rate improved dramatically within the first month.
